alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Areas of Fog Developing along the lower Texas coast tonight... Surface observations, satellite images and web cameras indicate that areas of fog are quickly developing along the lower Texas coast tonight. Visibilities of 1 to 3 miles in general can be expected with these areas of fog. Some isolated patches of dense fog may develop later tonight into early Friday morning reducing visibilities to a quarter of a mile at times. A Dense Fog Advisory may be needed for the coastal sections of Deep South Texas overnight into Friday morning. Motorists are urged to reduce speed, use low beam headlights, and avoid following other vehicles too closely in the areas of denser fog through the overnight and early morning hours.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Cameron; Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy
